title.rendered: Solana Application Revenue Skyrockets to $840M in Q4 2024

content.rendered: Much of the revenue was generated in November which topped $367 million or nearly $100 million more than the revenue generated in the entire previous quarter. Application Revenue on Solana Shoots up 213% Several so-called “Ethereum Killers” like Cardano and EOS have come and gone, but thus far, only Solana has given the “world computer” […]
